bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum main frame & stays w/ABP Convert, magnesium swing link, G2 Geometry, E2 tapered head tube, replaceable derailleur hanger, 110mm travel

components.description: Bontrager 28-hole FCC alloy front hub, Shimano M525 SL 32-hole alloy rear hub; Bontrager Mustang Disc 29 rims, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano M666 SLX hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
